name: Numerous Ninjas
description:
Also on Gamejolt: gamejolt.com/games/numerousninjas/423716

Do you like ninjas?

What about... Gravity defying ninjas?

Or maybe... Numerous Ninjas?

Well, what about Nauseous Ninjas or Nitro Ninjas?

If you do, or don't know if you like those types of ninjas...

Then try the gravity-defying, ninja-themed, nitro-power-filled game:

NUMEROUS NINJAS!!!

-Features-

  • Infinite chambers (Levels)
  • Simple controls
  • A group of 42 ninjas
  • Coins
  • Unlockable Skins
  • Unlockable Effects
  • Powerups
  • Cake

    (Wait a minute... CAKE?!?!)
